About Us

SquareChess aims to elevate chess skills through innovative tools and resources, making high-level chess preparation accessible to everyone.

Our platform is designed for chess enthusiasts, students, and professionals looking to improve their game. We value excellence, innovation, and accessibility in everything we do.

Fabiano Caruana

CEO/Founder

Julian Zapata-Hall

COO

Fabiano Caruana - CEO/Founder

Fabiano Caruana is an American chess grandmaster and a leading figure in the world of chess. His illustrious career includes winning the 2018 Candidates Tournament and challenging for the World Chess Championship. With a peak FIDE rating of 2844, he is among the highest-rated players in history. Fabiano's dedication to the game and his innovative approach to preparation are the driving forces behind SquareChess. His mission is to make high-level chess training accessible to all, fostering a new generation of chess champions.

© 2024 SquareChess.org All rights reserved.

); }; export default AboutUs;
